entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
